Docs.summary: The switch representation of this property for the case when the parent represents a tool parameter.
Docs.remarks: This field is optional and culture invariant.
Docs.example: The VC compiler has an named Optimizationused to specify the desired optimization type. All the admissible values for this property have switches, e.g. Disabled (switch = Od), "MinimumSize" (switch = O1), etc.
